duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide advanced product support, hardware, configuration, and software support via telephone, email, and on-site
Serve as a technical subject matter expert on assigned products throughout pre and post-launch processes
Assist in evaluation and escalation of issues, and provide service support, installation, and hardware repair training
Facilitate the escalation process and provide support for quality issues, rework projects, and equipment performance improvements
Represent the company through professional verbal and written communications and pro-actively respond to customer escalations and requests
Support in analyzing product failures and repair data, and provide product installations and training

education_certification.credential: Completion of program at a community college, technical or commercial school, or equivalent experience (minimum of a 2-year program)
